top_comments.comment: One of my favorite songs by Adele n this young talented lady Gave Me Goosebumps...love it keep it up

Allie Sherlock continues to break new ground  with almost every new video. Here she is really starting to show what she is capable of . Would be great to hear her at Glastonbury or the Isle of Wight  fest .. She is a unique and powerful performance artist-  would like to hear more of her own songs. These solo performances are the way to go for her I'm sure.
